Articles.Content:
The flag falls down almost every time I plant it. They can't seem to stand stable, but falls flat on the ground. When I right click, it shows "pick up" instead of "take down". 

Actually, the flag pole is inclined to the side which the Kerbal is facing once being planted, and then abruptly falls to this side after the flag is raised and the plaque window pops out. "Abruptly" here means that, I can see the screen shake a little, when the window pops out.

I admit that I am using a flag that I copied to GameData/Squad/Flags/flagname.png. I also set it to 512*256, BTW. The mods I use should not bother with the flags, but in case they do: I installed Recoupler, Mk1 Cabin Hatch, and Module Manager.

(Windows x64 1.11.1 install.)

What seems to be the problem? Is it some mod problem or my copied flags just won't stand stable?
